EXTRACTED VALUE: Perhaps with a little more time spent on the combat and a longer story, Just Cause could have been a much better title.
Too simple to be strategic, too slow to be a shooter, too basic to be next-generation. [Sept 2006, p.70]
We've been waiting two years longer than we expected for Hell's Highway and the wait has bought little reward.
Assuming you just spent a mountain of money to own the newest of the new in video gaming, you'll probably want to leave this marine lost in space.
